lines: Personality begins where comparison leaves off. Be unique. Be memorable. Be confident. Be proud.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb74ea81f8>

lines: Bravery shows up in everyday life when people have the courage to live their truth, their vision and their dreams.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb74f26828>

lines: Only when we're brave enough to explore the darkness will we discover the infinite power of our light.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb74fa9e80>

lines: Bravery is the audacity to be unhindered by failures, and to walk with freedom, strength, and hope, in the face of things unknown.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb7508e378>

lines: Be brave. Take risks. Nothing can substitute experience.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb75ab6f80>

lines: There is always light, if only we're brave enough to see it. If only we're brave enough to be it.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb762fa458>

lines: Give me six hours to chop down a tree, and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb76329938>

lines: First, I prepare. Then I have faith.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb76348630>

lines: We cannot always build the future for our youth, but we can build our youth for the future.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb762da928>

lines: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap, but by the seeds that you plant.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb763d3690>

lines: It's not the will to win that matters-everyone has that. It's the will to prepare to win that matters.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb763fd440>

lines: You can easily judge the character of others by how they treat those who can do nothing for them.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb7642c448>

lines: The greatest discovery of our generation is that human beings can alter their lives by altering their attitudes of mind. As you think, so shall you be.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb76355678>

lines: What we know matters but who we are matters more.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb76376b70>

lines: The truth of your character is expressed through the choice of your actions.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb76396808>

lines: A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb765e6630>

lines: When we create peace and harmony and balance in our minds, we will find it in our lives.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb76601638>

lines: Do your little bit of good where you are; its those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb7661c1b8>

lines: When we have peace in our hearts and minds, we draw peace into our lives.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb76643e70>

lines: It isn’t enough to talk about peace. One must believe in it. And it isn’t enough to believe in it. One must work at it.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb766b9030>

lines: Peace. It does not mean to be in a place where there is no noise, trouble or hard work. It means to be in the midst of those things and still be calm in your heart.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb76d12120>

lines: When you stay on purpose and refuse to be discouraged by fear, you align with the infinite self, in which all possibilities exist.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb76d92050>

lines: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb76e0d6b0>

lines: When you know who you are; when your mission is clear and you burn with the inner fire of unbreakable will; no cold can touch your heart; no deluge can dampen your purpose. You know that you are alive.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb76e53070>

lines: There is no greater gift you can give or receive than to honor your calling. It's why you were born. And how you become most truly alive.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb76e96e38>

lines: If you can't figure out your purpose, figure out your passion. For your passion will lead you right into your purpose.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb76ee41d8>

lines: It is tenderness for the past, courage for the present, hope for the future.  It is a fervent wish that every cup may overflow with blessings rich and eternal, and that every path may lead to peace.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb76f49c18>

lines: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb76fc4a08>

lines: And suddenly you know: It's time to start something new and trust the magic of beginnings.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb77047048>

lines: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb770938f8>

lines: What the new year brings to you will depend a great deal on what you bring to the new year.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb77156d08>

lines: The joy of brightening other lives, bearing each others' burdens, easing others' loads and supplanting empty hearts and lives with generous gifts becomes for us the magic of the holidays.
author: <Author:0x00007ffb771aeb70>
